name: Telling the Bees: Demo
description:
Telling the Bees is a team project done as a part of an university module to a brief given by a client.

Producer: Jordan Cordina
Design: Jordan Cordina, Linda Turunen
Art: Mikolaj Bakowski, Stuart Bunkell, Connor Campbell
Code: Kacper Brozyna, Scott McPherson, Galen Rodger
Audio: Marianna Braoun, Alexis Psillas
QA testing: Liam Rickman, Jack Teviotdale
